metaTitle: EDIFICIO SOPRANO Hondón de las Nieves | Villas from €261,000
metaDescription: EDIFICIO SOPRANO in Hondón de las Nieves. Modern villas and apartments from €261,000. 3 bedrooms, delivery December 2026. By TALMAR developer.

content.heroIntro: Welcome to EDIFICIO SOPRANO, an exceptional residential development by TALMAR located in the heart of Centro, Hondón de las Nieves, Alicante. This distinguished project offers a sophisticated blend of modern architecture and Mediterranean living, with stunning villas and apartments starting from €261,000. With completion scheduled for December 1st, 2026, EDIFICIO SOPRANO represents an outstanding investment opportunity in one of Costa Blanca's most sought-after locations. Each property is meticulously designed with premium finishes, private outdoor spaces, and access to comprehensive community amenities including a communal swimming pool. Whether you're seeking a primary residence, holiday home, or investment property, EDIFICIO SOPRANO delivers exceptional value in a vibrant, internationally-minded community where English is widely spoken and world-class amenities are within minutes of your doorstep.

locationSection.intro: Hondón de las Nieves is a charming municipality in the heart of Alicante's interior, perfectly positioned for those seeking authentic Spanish living with easy access to coastal leisure. Centro's strategic location offers the best of both worlds—a peaceful, established community with deep roots and modern conveniences. The area has become increasingly popular with international buyers seeking genuine value and a slower pace of life without sacrificing access to beaches, shopping, and healthcare. With property values increasing 8% year-on-year, Hondón de las Nieves represents one of Costa Blanca's smartest real estate choices. The region boasts excellent schools, including international options with British curriculum, reliable healthcare facilities, and a welcoming expat community where English is commonly spoken. From EDIFICIO SOPRANO, you're perfectly positioned to enjoy the Mediterranean lifestyle while maintaining practical connections to major amenities and transport links.
highlights: Beach: 20 minutes to multiple Blue Flag beaches
Shopping: Mercadona, Lidl, Consum supermarkets nearby
Schools: International schools with British curriculum

propertyFeatures.intro: EDIFICIO SOPRANO represents the pinnacle of contemporary residential design, constructed to the highest Spanish building standards with meticulous attention to quality and sustainability. Each property features premium materials, modern architectural styling, and thoughtful layouts that maximize natural light and ventilation. The development embodies TALMAR's commitment to excellence, delivering homes that combine energy efficiency with luxury finishes and practical living spaces suitable for families and professionals alike.
features: Double glazing with thermal break insulation

content.investmentSection: EDIFICIO SOPRANO presents a compelling investment opportunity in a region experiencing robust market growth. Property values in Hondón de las Nieves are appreciating at 8% year-on-year, significantly outpacing inflation and delivering strong capital appreciation potential. With prices 40% below comparable Spanish island markets, the development offers exceptional value for both owner-occupiers and investors. The rental market is equally attractive, with 7-night holiday rentals commanding €800 per week, providing excellent income potential for those seeking passive returns. TALMAR's established reputation, combined with the area's growing international appeal and improving infrastructure, positions EDIFICIO SOPRANO as a sound long-term investment. The completion date of December 2026 provides time for market appreciation before occupancy, while the established expat community ensures consistent demand for both long-term rentals and holiday lets.

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in EDIFICIO SOPRANO?
faqs.answer: EDIFICIO SOPRANO starts from €261,000. Properties include villas and apartments with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, built sizes from 77-127m². For current availability and specific pricing, please contact our team via WhatsApp or email.

faqs.question: When will EDIFICIO SOPRANO be completed?
faqs.answer: EDIFICIO SOPRANO is scheduled for delivery on December 1st, 2026. TALMAR provides a 10-year structural warranty on all properties. Specific unit delivery schedules vary—contact us for details on your preferred property.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of EDIFICIO SOPRANO?
faqs.answer: TALMAR is the developer of EDIFICIO SOPRANO. They have an established reputation for quality construction in Hondón de las Nieves and surrounding areas, with a commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction.

faqs.question: Is Costa Blanca a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Costa Blanca, particularly Hondón de las Nieves, offers excellent value with property appreciation of 8% year-on-year. The region features an established international community where English is commonly spoken, world-class healthcare within 30 minutes, beautiful Blue Flag beaches 20 minutes away, and several championship golf courses.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can freely purchase property in Spain without restrictions. No visa is required specifically for property purchase. Our team can guide you through the legal requirements, including obtaining a Spanish tax identification number (NIE) and navigating the conveyancing process.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Additional costs typically include: transfer tax (6-10% depending on region), notary fees (0.5-1%), property registration fees (0.5%), and legal fees (1-2%). For EDIFICIO SOPRANO in Alicante, budget approximately 8-12% above the purchase price for total acquisition costs.

faqs.question: How far is EDIFICIO SOPRANO from the beach?
faqs.answer: EDIFICIO SOPRANO is approximately 20 minutes from multiple Blue Flag beaches, providing easy weekend access to Costa Blanca's best coastal destinations while maintaining peaceful inland living.

faqs.question: What amenities are near EDIFICIO SOPRANO?
faqs.answer: Nearby amenities include: Mercadona, Lidl, and Consum supermarkets for shopping; a regional hospital within 30 minutes; several championship golf courses; international schools with British curriculum; and Alicante Airport 30 minutes away for convenient travel.

faqs.question: What are the property taxes in Spain?
faqs.answer: Spain's property taxes include: IBI (annual property tax, approximately 0.4-1.1% of cadastral value); and plusvalía municipal tax on sale profits. Rental income is taxed as personal income. Consult with a Spanish tax advisor for your specific situation.

content.conclusion: EDIFICIO SOPRANO represents an exceptional opportunity to acquire quality Mediterranean property in a thriving, value-conscious location. With TALMAR's proven expertise, strategic positioning near beaches and golf courses, and strong investment fundamentals, this development offers outstanding value for discerning buyers and savvy investors. The established international community, English-speaking environment, and excellent infrastructure make Hondón de las Nieves an ideal destination for those seeking authentic Spanish living without compromising on modern conveniences. Properties from €261,000 deliver unmatched value compared to island markets, while the 8% annual appreciation and €800 weekly rental potential provide compelling financial returns. Don't miss the opportunity to secure your piece of Costa Blanca's future. Contact our team today via WhatsApp for detailed information, floor plans, and to arrange a private viewing of this outstanding development.
